title: Clean Fuel Delivery
description:
This JSON Schema defines only the domain-specific claims inside `credentialSubject` for a Clean Fuel Delivery credential. It is intended for VCDM 2.0 credentials using SD-JWT as the proof mechanism.  
Base Verifiable Credential properties such as `@context`, `type`, `issuer`, `issuanceDate`, `validFrom`, `credentialSubject.id`, and `proof` are not included here and are handled by the issuing wallet or ecosystem.  
The semantic meaning of these properties is expected to be defined via JSON-LD contexts, including a Clean Fuel context and relevant UNTP vocabularies (e.g., UNTP Core and UNTP DTE).

deliveryId.description: Supplier-assigned unique identifier for this delivery event, such as a load ticket number, pump ticket, order line reference, or internal sales/delivery number. Required. Example: DEL-2025-007521

batchId.description: Identifier of the parent clean fuel batch from which this delivery is taken. Required. Example: BATCH-2025-000123

relatedPosNumber.description: Unique number of the PoS that covers the parent batch. Required. Example: ISCC-EU-PO-2025-00012345

deliveredQuantity.description: Quantity delivered to the buyer. Required. Example: 200

deliveredQuantityUnit.description: Unit of the delivered quantity. Required. Example: L

deliveryDate.description: Date of the delivery. Required. Example: 2025-03-15

buyerName.description: Name of the buyer receiving this delivery. Required. Example: Transportbedrijf Jansen BV

buyerIdentifier.description: Business identifier of the buyer, such as KVK, VAT/BTW, SIREN, SIRET, GLN, or other trade identifiers. Required. Example: KVK:81234567

deliveryLocation.description: Location where the delivery took place (e.g. depot, filling station, site, GPS reference). Optional. Example: Depot Rotterdam Waalhaven
